WorkflowInfo.Name: Compare two database tables
WorkflowInfo.Description: Compare contents of two database tables and send the different rows to Admin.
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:TSQLQuery;Assembly=TSQLQuery, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:MemoryTableComparison;Assembly=MemoryTableComparison, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:TSQLQuery Password="123456" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isUserAuthenticate="True" DisplayName="TSQL Query" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" ConnectionString="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;User Id=sql_user;Password=123456;" TypeName="TSQLQuery" Query="select * from hosts" SiteName="Default Site" EyeShareConnectionString="False" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="tsqlQuery1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="sql_user" Description="Preforms a database query on Microsoft SQL Server" ConnectionStringTextBox="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase" /> <ns0:TSQLQuery Password="123456" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isUserAuthenticate="True" DisplayName="TSQL Query" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" ConnectionString="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase;User Id=sql_user;Password=123456;" TypeName="TSQLQuery" Query="select * from servers" SiteName="Default Site" EyeShareConnectionString="False" TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="tsqlQuery2" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="sql_user" Description="Preforms a database query on Microsoft SQL Server" ConnectionStringTextBox="Data Source=myServerAddress;Initial Catalog=myDataBase" /> <ns1:MemoryTableComparison IsValid="True" x:Name="memoryTableComparison1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSetTarget="%tsqlQuery1%" isUseColumnKey="0" DisplayName="Memory Table Comparison" ShowEqual="0" Description="Performs a comparison between two ResultSets." TypeName="MemoryTableComparison" ResultSetSource="%tsqlQuery2%" ColumnKey="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%memoryTableComparison1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="memoryTableComparison1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns3:ReturnValue Value="0" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType=">" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& > 0" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns4:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%memoryTableComparison1%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /> <ns5:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Tables "hosts" and "servers" are different" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16721"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P><FONT face=Arial><STRONG><U>The different rows 
are:</U></STRONG><BR><BR>%convertToHTMLTable1%</FONT></P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns3:ReturnValue Value="Default Branch" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="{x:Null}" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="0" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process compares the contents of 2 database tables and sends the differences report to Admin.
